capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid is indeed an affiliated professor at Hogwarts. I've had the pleasure of meeting him on several occasions, and he's always been very kind to me. He's a fantastic gamekeeper and teacher, and I think he does a great job of taking care of the magical creatures in his care.

I'm really proud to be affiliated with Hogwarts, it's an incredible school that has given me so much. I've had the opportunity to work closely with some amazing people and have been a part of some truly unforgettable experiences. Being affiliated with Hogwarts is a huge honor for me, and I feel very lucky to be a part of its community.
